summary.span: 表示 中的非可选日期的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of non-selectable dates in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含用户无法选择指定多个日期的对象。The contains objects that specify multiple dates that cannot be selected by a user. 若要使过去的所有日期不可选，可以使用方法。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 类型的一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下面的示例创建在代码和具有无法选择某些日期的标记。The following example creates a in code and markup that has some dates that cannot be selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![不能选择的日期的日历。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "不能选择的日期的日历。")![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.") 不能选择的日期的日历Calendar with dates that cannot be selected

summary.span: 向集合中添加 之前的所有日期。

span.span: Adds all dates before to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以防止用户选择在过去的日期。Use this method to prevent users from selecting dates that are in the past. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包括事件处理程序。The following example creates a that includes a event handler. [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#6)] 下面的示例演示事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handler. 事件处理程序调用方法，以便只有将来的日期可选择。The event handler calls the method to make only future dates selectable. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#7)]
